description: Number of solutions to Langford (or Langford-Skolem) problem (up to reversal of the order).
comments: These are also called Langford pairings.2*a(n)=A176127(n) gives the number of ways are of arranging the numbers 1,1,2,2,3,3,...,n,n so that there is one number between the two 1's, two numbers between the two 2's, ..., n numbers between the two n's.a(n) > 0 iff n == 0 or 3 mod 4.
